attributes.action: Increase the maximum sentencing guidelines for animal cruelty offences
attributes.background: The current maximum sentence for animal cruelty offences is six months imprisonment or a fine up to £20,000, with the majority of custodial sentences being suspended so the offender serves no time in prison. Such lenient punishments do not act as a deterrent to crimes against defenceless animals.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105764

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
